website_summaries.verdict: A sensual and rich perfume that's garnered a lot of lifelong fans. Over 700 ingredients, including sandalwood, patchouli, and musk blend with rose and jasmine.
pros: This is a complex scent that's sexy and seductive
It only needs a light application, and often generates a lot of compliments
It also evokes nostalgia for a lot of users
cons: It's polarizing – you either love it or hate it
Some commented that it was best for mature women
It's at a higher price point

customer_reviews.title: I was ecstatic to find my favorite perfume on line for such an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic to find my favourite perfume on line for such an awesome price! Ha! Well If something looks too good to be true, it probably is! I am so disappointed. I love this fragrance, but this is not the same perfume I have been buying from the department store for the last 20 years or so. It seems to be a very weak version of the original, when I use Aromatics a little goes a long way, this stuff is gone almost as soon as you put it on! Lesson learned, there are some things you just have to pay the price for.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. LadyA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ITS NOT THE SAME FRAGANCE.... WHAT HAPPEN WITH THE ORIGINAL? I WANT MY MONEY BACK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another can NOT LIVE withOUT Aeromatics Elixir!
customer_reviews.text: I have a literally been wearing this sent since I would steal it from my mothers wardrobe back in 1979. Awls I can say is everybody knows me for this sent everybody loves it. It has a hint of patchouli and it goes incredible with actual patchouli oil. You either love it or you hate it. I’d try it on in a department store first and see if your chemistry matches. Because it is a very distinct sent. I’ve been buying mine from this seller for a while now ❤️ Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Lettie’s Life

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for years and it never smelled like this. It was giving me a headache and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product smells awful and is not the same as Clinique Elixir. I have used this product for years and it never smelled like this. It was giving me a headache and I had to wash it off the smell was so overpowering. The Elixir I know doesn't not smell like this. I have gotten a lot of compliments over the years and the real one lingers in a pleasant way for a long time. Sorry I bought this and had to throw it away so now have to spend more money to get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Not the read Elixir
customer_reviews.text: I too have been wearing Elixir for over 30 years and I decided to try this at a significantly lower price. BAD! This is NOT Clinique’s Elixir; no way! I’ve already thrown the box away or I’d send it back. I’m so disappointed that I didn’t follow the lead of those I read who gave this one star. Feeling very sad......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Clinique
customer_reviews.text: Thank you I will be back. But only if you get the product elsewhere. I thought it was just me but after reading its not,.the scrnt is NOTthe same the color is not the same. The scent would for days be in my clothes my sheets, in my vehicle, etc, s beautiful distinct smell and it stayed. I always always got complements. . I am disappointed and would to be compensated or a bottle of the real clinique
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: and everytime I did use it it always smelled to good. I always received many complements during the day
customer_reviews.text: I have used Aromatic Elixir for years, and everytime I did use it it always smelled to good. I always received many complements during the day. I seen that this cologne was cheaper than what I have paid for it, so I decided to order it. Once I ordered the Elixir it didn't smell the same like my other bottle that I had. I thought that maybe it was just me, so I put this on the side and decided to try it again, every time I used it never smelt the same to me. I would not order this again, but I will go to the Mall and buy it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzane

customer_reviews.title: Smells like raid.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like raid. Amazon won’t let me return this. I can’t even use as air freshener because it smells so bad. Really angry that I’m stuck with this. Amazon says it can’t be returned cause flammable liquids can’t be mailed. Wasn’t it flammable when you mailed it to me??!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: My favorite perfume
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to Dillard's or Macy's for this product, but since I now have back issues and don't get around as well, I order from Amazon. Great product that matches the one from the store and much easier to order online. Quick and easy. Quick delivery too. I have worn this perfume for years. It's not sweet, but rather aromatic and a bit stronger. You don't need much. I get compliments ALL the time.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this perfume
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, my favorite perfume. I've worn it for years and always receive compliments. This particular perfume is exactly what you would buy at a retail store from the packaging to the bottle. What's more, the scent is identical.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I love Clinique's Aromatics Elixir
customer_reviews.text: My absolute most favorite perfume. I totally get so many compliments from people about this perfume. They even ask me, "What is that fragrance?" and if they are afraid that they might forget they ask to write it down. I love, love it. Please don't ever stop selling this. Sincerely, Aleda Spencer 😊
customer_reviews.author: Aleda N. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Has a wonderful scent, sexy and wonerful smell on my wife !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE TO SMELL THIS PARFUM ON MY WIFE, WONDERFUL, SEXY SCENT THAT DRIVES ME WILD. I HAVE BEN BUYING THIS PERUME FOR HER MANY YEARS NOW !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: catfish

customer_reviews.title: No Smell?!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Aromatics Elixir for my mother who has been wearing this fragrance for YEARS. I was pleased her package arrived on time; however, it was an extreme disappointment for her and myself to discover it has NO SCENT. Not sure if this is just a defective bottle, but this brand/product is generally a pungent flavor. There's no way my mother should have reported back to me that it had no smell. Luckily, I am being refunded for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments when I wear this fragrance. It’s not over whelming and seems to linger longer then more expensive fragrances. I replace whenever I run out. It’s a good everyday product
customer_reviews.author: Anydots

customer_reviews.title: This perfume did not have the scent that I know to be Clinique.
customer_reviews.text: This perfume did not have the same scent that I have purchased in the past. I have been wearing this perfume for nearly 20 years and I thought I would try and buy it online for convenience and when I opened the box, the perfume was not the same. I was very disappointed because it was lower priced than normal. I will just continue to buy it from the Mall.
customer_reviews.author: marianne lucero

customer_reviews.title: Seller sold with a bad sprayer. Didn't spray.
customer_reviews.text: My mother LOVES this perfume however, this particular seller sold it with a bad sprayer. This was most likely a tester. Luckily my mom didn't throw away her old bottle so she was able to just replace the sprayer but it's never right to receive products that do not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell Like Aromatics Elixir
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I am writing a negative review on Amazon. I have worn this perfume for 40 years and what was in the bottle did not smell like Aromatic Elixir. There was not much scent and what was their was faintly unpleasant. I wonder if this was an old bottle or if Clinique has a problem. Don't buy this on Amazon because you can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherK

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, This!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and you would think I would be tired of it by now but I'm not. Just a little goes a long way and it last forever, and I always get compliments and asked what it is I'm wearing. However I must confess I never reveal what it is I'm wearing cause I don't want everyone walking around smelling like me so I pretend I can't remember! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PARFUME!!! My mom wore this when I was a kid and I was always impressed by the uniqueness of the fragrance. Also by its lasting power. I have had many many people, including men, ask me what I was wearing. But 1 CAVEAT...you CANNOT DROWN yourself in it like a standard parfume or you will leave a trail of dead people in your wake. My adcice is to spray it overhead and walk into it. If thats not enough, do it again. Just be VERY SPARING and you will love it too. The complaints I've read had to do with exactly this drawback. Use it correctly and you to will be enamored.
customer_reviews.author: Margo J. Aly

customer_reviews.title: Mom's fave...
customer_reviews.text: This is my mom's favorite perfume. Amazon definitely has the best price online. Christmas is right around the corner, will be ordering another bottle soon for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Lady JB.Knight

customer_reviews.title: Always my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this since I was 16 - let's just say it's been a long time :) I love this fragrance. This is once of those scents that smells differently on everyone who wears it in my opinion. Good I think on everyone but just a hint different depending on your body chemistry. I will always be a repeat customer. Love it! I arrived so quickly too. Perfect. Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent and I’m able to get it online!!Thank you Amazon prime!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over 30 years . I love it . I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. I am so glade that I can buy Aromatic Elixir on line.
customer_reviews.author: lynne pratt

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. It has a slight floral smell, but it's not overpowering. Very crisp and clean. I always get a lot of compliments while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha M.

customer_reviews.title: Always my go-to scent
customer_reviews.text: Aromatics Elixir has been my go-to fragrance for years. It’s a lovely scent that isn’t too heavy. I get compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Clinic perfume is A fake one.
customer_reviews.text: I love smell of clinic perfume but this time I bought it from Amazon smell so bad that I have to take a shower. Long story short don't buy it from amazon. Also I have to add watch out clinic is made in USA but Amazon one is made in Switzerland.
customer_reviews.author: moa

customer_reviews.title: Not perfume
customer_reviews.text: I looked up perfume and thought that this was it! And it was not sent does not last long won’t order again
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor impression of an excellent product. Learn from our mistake: pony up the extra money at the department store and get something decent. We thought this was that: it is not. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: ZERO stars really. Just received this perfume. It is a terrible, overpowering scent. Got on Amazon online and found out it is non-returnable. I wouldn't even dare gift it to anyone. What a big waste of money, I am so upset. Plus now I have to deal with this horrible scent on me til I reach the shower to wash it off! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Less "Mysterious" as Earlier?
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Elixir for 30 years, and I have noticed the scent has become stronger -- less "mysterious", as they say. It's not for everyone, but you can't judge by the first application. It does change on one's skin throughout the day, but I think that has even changed.
customer_reviews.author: Aby Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite scent, what more can I say! I surprised her by ordering this from Amazon and she was delighted. Boy, does she smell like a million bucks!

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love Aromatics Elixir. It’s my scent and I always get compliments whenever I wear it. Buying this through Amazon saved me money compared to department store prices.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is my signature fragrance since 1985. The very first fragrance by Clinique.

customer_reviews.title: Strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear all the time and stopped ordered recently, it’s a very potent smell. I love it but if you prefer a light fragrance—this isn’t for you.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping, fabulous fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time fave perfume. I use it almost everyday. I am constantly stopped by men and women asking what is the fragrance I am wearing. I only buy it twice a year and from the looks of things I will be buying it again from this seller. The price is right and the shipping was quick. I love wearing it and I will continue to do so as long as this seller keeps selling it at such a great price. I will never go to the mall again to buy it. I give the seller/shipper 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marsharena

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend wears this and it smelled great, but when I got mine and put it ...

customer_reviews.title: This perfume is not legitimate!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this scent for many years, and this one stinks after a while. I had to have my coat cleaned, because the smell turns really funky after awhile. I'm soo disappointed. From now on, I'll pay full price in a Department Store. So disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Take me back to my childhood!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Growing up my grandmother wore this perfume. I noticed she hadn't been wearing it in awhile and bought this for her for Xmas. Smelling it brought back so many memories. Also had no idea how strong it is me whole apart smells like it from just two sprays lol

customer_reviews.title: Reliably beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've used this scent for close to 35 yrs and still get compliments about it.

customer_reviews.title: Bad oder
customer_reviews.text: The oder/scent is fine when first sprayed on. But after an hour or so, it smells sour. My wife has used this product for 30+ years and never encounter this problem. Her nose is omnipotent. She can smell a fly fart in Brazil. I think it is probably a knockoff. DO NOT buy from this seller. Stick with buying from Clinique or from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Grillerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, good price
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. The wife has worn this for years. This is a good price for it.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you have never smelled this cologne then you need to go to a store near you and try it on, the bottle I got from Amazon was less than the smaller bottle you get from Dillard's. I love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this Product since 1984, I can never go wrong with it

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Aromatic Elixir Parfum Spray for Women by Clinique for over a decade and it never disappoints! It has a sweet jasmine rosy, patchouli smell, lasts throughout the day, and smell uniquely different on every woman. Very feminine and sexy! You will love it!

customer_reviews.title: A perfume that last all day long
customer_reviews.text: Undeniable smell sense that will get you so many compliments it's unbelievable in a day.

customer_reviews.title: Have always adored this scent. First noticed it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Have always adored this scent. First noticed it on someone in 2004 and asked what fragrance she was wearing and found out it was this. Everyone recognizes that I might be in close proximity if they notice the scent lingering in the air. LOL
customer_reviews.author: C. Schisler

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite scent for 35 years. I stopped a women on the streets of NYC when I was in my early 20's to ask her what she was wearing. Thankfully she was willing to tell me and I have worn it since.
customer_reviews.author: Beulah

customer_reviews.title: A little scent from home.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I wear this fragrance someone compliments me on the aroma. I have worn this fragrance for over 20 years. When my daughter was away at school and was homesick she said that just smelling the aroma made her feel so much closer.

customer_reviews.title: Not Aromatic Elixir
customer_reviews.text: The product I received does NOT smell like Aromatic Elixir. I have worn it for years and after hoping for a different outcome (trying on several different occasions) I am comfortable with saying this is not what I receive from Clinique when purchased in a department store. Unfortunately Amazon will not refund payment for defective fragrances, so be careful when buying from them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca White

customer_reviews.title: Item is watered down.  Item does not carry the long scent that it is know for.
customer_reviews.text: Item is watered down. This was a Mother's Day gift to my Mom. This is her favorite perfume. She is very disappointed in product. It does not carry the long last scent that it is known for. I will not be ordering again nor will I recommend anyone.
customer_reviews.author: necole stinson

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic Elixir Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume/scent. I use it all the time. I highly recommend it. I receive so many compliments when I'm wearing it.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend trying it out at a store to make sure it works for u. If so- smells great & lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Love the perfume- been wearing it for 30 years. It works great with your body chemistry. Recommend trying it at Dillard’s or Macy’s (for example), before buying it because it doesn’t smell good on everyone. Got the last bottle on amazon for a great price, before Christmas!!

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this scent. It’s been my signature scent for over twenty years. It’s a classic and it’s the only thing I have to wear to make me feel feminine and beautiful. Well.... Aromatics and mascara.

customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume! I have worn it for the past few years and will continue too!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: No comments
customer_reviews.text: Not made in the USA And the smell did not last long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My authentic signature scent!  Top 3 pleasures of life!  It’s that good...
customer_reviews.text: My signature scent. It is the real deal, I don’t buy it anywhere else because it’s the best price delivered to my door. Complete no-brained!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique Aromatic Elixir Spray Parfum! I’ve used this for about 25 years and still love its fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: It’s the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this online, especially with the price being half of what I would pay in a department store. I have been wearing this scent for 30 years & I can tell you, this is the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this fragrance for thirty years. My husband usually buys it for me and this was cheaper than you can buy in department store. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: ann ford

product_meta.title: Aromatic Elixir Parfum Spray for Women by Clinique 3.4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:3.4 OunceAromatics Elixir Parfum Spray 3.3 Oz / 100 Ml for Women by Clinique
feature_bullets: A classic designer fragrance for women
Perfect for gift giving on any occasion, all year round
This feminine scent possesses a blend of fresh and woody with blend of oakmoss, white jasmine, chamomile and patchouli
Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above
With notes of rose, jasmine, ylang ylang and vetiver
